website_summaries.verdict: Customers looking for an exceptionally-rated inflatable pillow will find their match in this lightweight product.
pros: Option to purchase in different colors and designs
Inflatable construction makes product extremely lightweight and compact
cons: Stiffer build than many customer appreciated

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Zzzzzz's
customer_reviews.text: The build quality is fantastic! A valve with multiple functions that works perfectly. Open the first cover to blow up the pillow through the one way valve or press the button once to let out small amounts of air to adjust firmness. Press it again to retain re-engage the one way valve. Open the second cover to let all the air out quickly for packing it away. The materials are soft like felt(ish). Ok maybe not felt, but it does not feel like slippery plastic under your head that you constantly have to fight with like a balloon. Packs up tiny. It's easier to fold and roll than stuff. Impressive product.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Hebert

customer_reviews.title: So versatile!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is even better than I imagined! I purchased it to use while backpacking, but it's so handy that I've started using it at home too - I fill it not quite all the way, and put it behind my head when reading in bed at night, and it's much more comfortable than having my head against the headboard! I really like the mechanism for blowing it up, with the button that you depress to open/close the valve. My only complaint, and it's not really a complaint so I'm not taking off a star, is that the bag is just a little bit too small - I really have to shove to get the pillow back into it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Love this pillow
customer_reviews.text: I used this during my backpacking trip to Havasupai. I have only used my clothes as pillow in the past for several reasons but this pillow gave me no reason not to bring one in my future backpacking trips! It’s very small, lightweight, and only cost 1/3 of the price of those branded backpacking pillows!! Also, it has buttons in the opening you can toggle to hold air in when you’re inflating it and toggle it back when you’re deflating. I did not know this and thought at first that I broke it during my first use.
customer_reviews.author: mjdianne

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow I used for my back on the long flight to Africa and all other air travel. I used for a pillow for my head. At home I use it in a chair and in bed sitting up it gives me maximum support all around. I like that I can add air or less air depending on my comfort level. While traveling so many folks asked me about it and I told everyone where they could get one from:) Enjoy comfort this will help immensely.....
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: which is kinda good, I guess
customer_reviews.text: It has no give once you blow it up, which is kinda good, I guess, except it ends up making your head think you're sleeping on a rock. This, combined with being about three inches too tall for me so that my neck also had a horrible cramp after I slept on it. No bueno. That said, it WAS ultralight and super easy to inflate and compacted easily. If someone needs their head lifted pretty high to becomfortable who doesn't mind the ultra-firmness of air, you'd probably like it. Not for me!
customer_reviews.author: M. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure I would like an inflatable pillow, but decided to try it for a recent camping trip. It was nice to not have to take space up in the car with another pillow( our vehicle is small). I did bring one pillow with and put that on top of this one, but it worked really well, and didn't fall over the top of the mattress like my normal pillows have a tendancy to do. I'd highly recommend giving this a try.
customer_reviews.author: katherine chesney

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive AND comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow because of the price. I had looked at more expensive, well-known brands but didn't think I could afford them. I saw a positive review of the Trelology pillow on YouTube and it was so affordable that I ordered it immediately. I am so pleased with it! It packs up to a tiny size, it's lightweight, it's easy to inflate and it gives my head and neck the support I need. I'm a side sleeper and the recessed center part of the pillow fits me perfectly. I love this pillow!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Blair

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and soft
customer_reviews.text: I'm a backpacker and have never carried a pillow before in order to keep my pack weight down. But when i saw how light this one is and how small it packs up I decided to treat myself and give it a try. Although I haven't tried it out I can tell you it's pretty amazing. It's soft to the touch and comfortable! I will be doing a long trip beginning next week in Shenandoah National Park and I'm looking forward to putting it to the test.
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: Wow so comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about using an inflatable pillow. Usually inflatables are either too thick or thin or slippery etc. The way this one is made is perfect! It cradles my head at just the right height for side sleeping. I’m very satisfied with this purchase and will recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AmyVsings

customer_reviews.title: Best camping pillow ever!
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are great for sleeping. I purchased one and my husband tried and said "get me one too!" So yes comfortable- easily adjust for what you prefer. Great and easy to roll up to tiny bag....and easy to inflate and deflate....recommend for traveling and camping!
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Good design, don't overinflate
customer_reviews.text: I assumed sleeping with severe neck/shoulder pain was just a part of backpacking until I got this pillow. I now happily carry it in my pack not only because it makes sleeping on the ground sustainable, but because it packs down to the size of a small pair of socks. The material is soft to the touch (side sleeper), and is pretty quiet when brushed up against. My only issue was with the valve leaking after a year of use, which may have been because of overinflating the pillow, putting too much pressure on the valve. Definitely give this thoughtfully designed pillow a try, and enjoy the fun colors :)
customer_reviews.author: Alison Heidel

customer_reviews.title: Super customer service - Awesome backpacking pillow
customer_reviews.text: I love the lightweight packability and the cool colors. But the new one-way valve that is supposed to make inflating easier stopped working after a few days. Now it is impossible to blow it up completely because the air escapes out before I can get the plug back in. Update 7.18.18 Trekology contacted me within a few hours and sent out a replacement pillow. Excellent customer service. Great product. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Bachi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for Camping
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these for camping, both back packing and car camping and it is one of my favorite camping accessories. We have had our for 2 years now and they are easy to store, easy to inflate, easy to deflate and pack back up and they function wonderfully. i care to say I like them better than my full size pillows at home on my bed. Additionally they have held up for the past two years with virtually no signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Bonofiglio

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to inflate
customer_reviews.text: It is an inflatable pillow. It blows up quickly and the valve is awesome! Pillow is super small, folds up perfectly back into bag, light weight and deflates quickly. The missing star is because it could be more comfortable, I have neck pain sometimes and this pillow cause the pain to flair up a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't actually taken it on a backpack trip yet - BUT - it just arrived and I immediately blew it up and laid down on the floor with it. It is SO much more comfortable than a pile of my extra clothing, so far it seems to be holding air well. I can't wait to use it on a trip. If anything changes, I'll update, but initial impressions are GOOD!!
customer_reviews.author: Georgie

customer_reviews.title: A girl needs her beauty sleep in the backcountry too.....
customer_reviews.text: Used two of these on a 7 day backpacking trip. I am a side sleeper, so need one for my head, and one between my knees. These made my sleeping experience better in the backcountry. I loved how easy they are to inflate and deflate, and how simple it is to adjust the fullness of the pillows to my liking. My husband likes his too.
customer_reviews.author: Cabezon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for air travel or camping. I bought two: One for lumbar support, one for my head to use during transcontinental flights. They inflate/deflate so easily, have a great valve mechanism, and fold up to next to nothing in my carry-on. The fabric is smooth textured, so these pillows are quite nice and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: LKB

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: A lovely little pillow. Because of the shape, I would mostly recommend this to someone who sleeps on their back. It was still comfortable when I slept on my side, but when I was on my back, it just seemed to be more designed to be slept on that way.
customer_reviews.author: TABITHA

customer_reviews.title: Just right for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Used for airplane, train and hotel. I had limited baggage rpsvevsnd yuis worked perfectly. Folded and molded for all my needs. Although I had trouble getting all airvoutvyo out back in bag at first, got the hang of it. It will be s regular traveling item for me.
customer_reviews.author: barbjvan

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow for camping
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow for camping. Small travel size, easy to inflate and keeps its air in
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiian Tita

customer_reviews.title: Good basic inflatable pillow
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is great for camping but quite loud when you move around. I placed a T-shirt over it for backpacking but for other travel it would probably need a real pillowcase.
customer_reviews.author: MKG

customer_reviews.title: So uncomfortable. Perfect tiny pack and easy to blow up.
customer_reviews.text: Love how it packs. Hate how it breaks my neck. So uncomfortable. I got them for me and my 3 kids and we truly all hate them unless we also put sweatshirts on top of them or something. Will just bring real pillows next trip.
customer_reviews.author: mother of twins, Atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Light and compact
customer_reviews.text: This will be used as a lumbar cushion when flying long distances. It should be very comfortable as it is at home. Like how it easily inflates and deflates and folds into a compact size for taking in a plane.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Small in the pack, big enough under my head. I wrap in a t-shirt for more comfort and less shifting around. I am glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: medmark

customer_reviews.title: Camping must
customer_reviews.text: Took a couple of puffs and Tada, pillow. Helped me save space since while I was flying and didn’t have to worry about packing or continuously carrying a pillow
customer_reviews.author: Julie Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great for light travel
customer_reviews.text: Not the most comfortable. But they don't take up any space, great for travel and light comping.
customer_reviews.author: KME

customer_reviews.title: Valve fails on 2 pillows after a few days
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of those and took them on a week-long camping trip. After 2 days the valve failed on the first one: pushing the button did not close the valve anymore and the grey plastic cap is not enough to prevent the air from slowly leaking out. Towards the end of the trip the second pillow started having the same problem. Two stars because for the little time they worked the pillows were comfortable enough, but highly disappointed in their durability.
customer_reviews.author: fra38

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Love the new valve
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Love the new valve. Indentation is not as deep as it seems in the picture, which was actually a plus for me. Look like they will work well for our trip. Will up date if there are any issues, but so far they seem great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and small
customer_reviews.text: Extremely compact...which is exactly what I was looking for. My other pillow is very bulky and this one saves room in my backpack. I can also make it firm or soft and the material is like a soft velvet
customer_reviews.author: JC Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is a great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow! It has enough height to allow my shoulder to rest easily, being a side sleeper. It’s easy to adjust the firmness. Sherman is most attentive to the product and customer satisfaction
customer_reviews.author: tereann

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It’s bigger and cheaper than sea to summit and I’d say more comfortable! This pillow will be in my pack till it wears out :)
customer_reviews.author: MarthaRC

customer_reviews.title: Made for Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I bought several of these for Christmas gifts, and everyone has loved them. Because of their inflation ability, they can be tailored to each individuals comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is as comfortable as one can expect for an inflatable pillow
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is the right size, light weight, and priced right. It is difficult to hold on to or pick up even when not fully inflated. It is as comfortable as one can expect for an inflatable pillow.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: I already tried it out and I really like how easy to inflate and deflate it is
customer_reviews.text: I already tried it out and I really like how easy to inflate and deflate it is. It’s very compact and is great for Scout camping!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Kappenman

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it .. I adjust the air frequently whether I use it behind my back or behind my head or on the tray table when I'm flying such a space saver and soft
customer_reviews.author: angie wonogas

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, affordable and light weight. The backpacking trifecta!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one for my wife as a gift and she/we liked it so much, I bought another for my self! Great inflation/deflation valve system. Wish my air mattresses had one like it!
customer_reviews.author: Locke Nest Adventures

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable pillow.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable and supportive pillow. I actually use it instead of the regular ones as they don't hold their shape like this one and you can easily adjust how much pressure you have.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Inflatable pillow
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is very light. I had to play with the air a little to get it comfy. It was also difficult to put the plug in after inflating. This is not something I like to use for car camping but it has been nice for backpacking.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Ware

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not my cup of tea
customer_reviews.text: It's small, it's light, I just might not be an inflatable pillow person. I had to inflate it about halfway to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Lapointe

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: The durable quality, surface texture and SIZE of this pillow vs how tiny and lightweight it is when rolled and bagged is an unbelievably great deal for the price point. Very impressed. Would also be excellent in a carry-on bag for naps in flight.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is super easy to inflate and deflate. It held the air and it was very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is perfect for camping and compacts really well
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is perfect for camping and compacts really well. It’s very easy to put back in the tiny sack... I thought it was going to be a challenge, but I was wrong. I definitely recommend this for campers who like to have compacting gear for backpacking several nights, it’s super light too!!!
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: It’s a nice pillow just not as comfortable as I would have ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice pillow just not as comfortable as I would have liked. It wasn’t the design or the pillow I think it was just not my preference. I’ll keep it just in case because it’s better than nothing but I’ll continue my search for a more comfortable option.
customer_reviews.author: Comfort and Cute!

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: To lite weight and sounds like I was sleeping on school paper. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I never thought an inflatable pillow could be comfortable, but I slept so well on a nine-day camping trip!
customer_reviews.author: K. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Super Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Packs up super small, can fit in the palm of your hand. Perfect for backpacking
customer_reviews.author: Jake O.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work as a pillow for me
customer_reviews.text: Maybe Not the best in terms of pillows, but I still really like it I keep it in my truck it makes a great lap dest for writing in my journal during break time at work
customer_reviews.author: c.sharp

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Rather small not sure it would be very helpful. Returned
customer_reviews.author: LNicole

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this pillow!! I love a softer pillow while my hubby likes his more firm. I blew mine up as little as I wanted while he was saying he would want to buy another :) overall Awesome pillow !! Easy to roll up again, uses very little space in my pack and can even be strapped onto the outside if ever needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best travel pillow I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best travel pillow I have ever used! Perfect for backpacking. It weighs practically nothing, so I had no problem bringing it along.What makes it so great is that you inflate and deflate (easily) until it feels good.
customer_reviews.author: moi

customer_reviews.title: Good for post-surgery too!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use to support my lower leg while recovering from a broken ankle. I love the ease of inflating and deflating, as well as the compactness of the pillow. I can carry it with me and have a cushion to prop up my leg wherever I go!
customer_reviews.author: Jinjure

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow!! changed my backpacking trips - I sleep better!!
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: This color is the best for me when traveling! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: sophie

customer_reviews.title: Great! Works well for car camping or backpacking
customer_reviews.text: Great! Works well for car camping or backpacking. Light weight, good support.
customer_reviews.author: bcarey

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Omg, this literally saved my life. I use this every time I go to the field and it’s so convenient. Such a great product I had to purchase another one
customer_reviews.author: Charlize Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and compact
customer_reviews.text: Used for a one week camping trip. Very comfortable and compact.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I Love it! easy to inflate and super easy to roll up
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Pillows got a hole in them after one use. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Nate R.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little pillow
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little pillow. Totally different from other inflatable pillows. It's one of my favorite new additions to my hiking gear. Nice and light and totally worth the ounces.
customer_reviews.author: P Casey

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a comfortable pillow and cheaper than other brands. Packs up tiny. Material is soft of face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Was not impressed with this product, my wife says you slide off of it while sleeping on it.
customer_reviews.author: James H. Treece

customer_reviews.title: because it’s so nice! Great product especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is so comfy! My husband and I both got one and questioned why we should only use it camping, because it’s so nice! Great product especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: mary jennings

customer_reviews.title: comfortable pillows.
customer_reviews.text: My whole family is ready to go camping with these light weight, comfortable pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Jill quisenberry

customer_reviews.title: Too bad
customer_reviews.text: Thing deflated the first time I used it. Wasn't on any rocks or anything sharp... Just inside my sleeping bag on top of a blow up mattress. Real bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Dueck

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly, even in extreme cold!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife right before a winter trip in -20F weather. Comfortable, stayed inflated in extreme cold, fit her sleeping bag perfectly. Going to buy a couple more for the kids very soon!
customer_reviews.author: APS

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first but now 1 year and about 10 years later I have 2 pillows that don't stay inflated for more than 3 hours. Sucks when you wake up and it's totally flat!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So lightweight and makes backpacking/camping way more comfortable after a long day of hiking! My favorite backpacking purchase by far!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great night's sleep
customer_reviews.text: Just took two of these on our 5 day/4 night backpacking trip- they were AWESOME. It was the best sleep I have had on a backpacking trip- should have gotten a pillow before!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for backpacking
customer_reviews.text: Gives my head just what it needs for me to get a good nights rest when I am out backpacking
customer_reviews.author: Lee Whiting

customer_reviews.title: easy to blow up and put back into the little ...
customer_reviews.text: It was everything I had hoped for, easy to blow up and put back into the little pouch, and very comfortable as a pillow under your head.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula Sadlowski

customer_reviews.title: they are very confortable and so easy to inflate etc
customer_reviews.text: These are grate pillows; they are very confortable and so easy to inflate etc.!
customer_reviews.author: JIM MCMICHEN

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Awesome backpacker pillow! Perfect size and lightweight. Wouldn’t trade it for anything.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Ervin

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: lifetime guarantee?? used twice and will no longer hold air
customer_reviews.author: richard Leal

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Lightweight, Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for family members who were backpacking overseas. They were durable, lightweight, comfortable and adjustable (by how much air you put in) for comfort. A friend has neck pain and uses one because they're more stable than a feather or foam type pillow. Highly recommend these. They roll up tight so they don't take up space if your traveling with luggage limits. Sturdy and held up well. I was very pleased and recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: W. Winslow

customer_reviews.title: No conference meeting w/o it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific cushion. I use if 1/2 inflated when I have to sit in chairs or on flights for a long time. It gives just enough movement & bounce to give my hips and low back support and mobility. Everyone who borrows my seat comments on what a comfy seat I have. It’s small and easy to carry to conferences. I’ll gladly tug-of-war a camper/ hiker for the last one.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Great for side sleepers
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is perfect for backpacking. I've tried 3 other styles of pillows, and this is by far the best. It's great for side sleepers because it actually props you up high enough. It's also really lightweight, about the size of my palm. It's also super affordable. Love!
customer_reviews.author: A. Baker

customer_reviews.title: This is soft and comfortable, and does not make a lot of noise ...
customer_reviews.text: This is soft and comfortable, and does not make a lot of noise (some pillows do). I use it as a travel pillow for business trips, so that I lessen the dust mite issues with hotel pillows. It deflates quickly and packs very small.
customer_reviews.author: Mobile Man

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to carry in my purse, easy to inflat and deflat. This is the 3rd order I placed on the same item.
customer_reviews.author: Boomer

customer_reviews.title: Great, easy to use, very light.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this pillow. It comes in a tiny little sack, inflates and deflates easily and fits back into its sack without any trouble. It is extremely light and doesn’t add much weight to my pack.
customer_reviews.author: LAB

customer_reviews.title: Popped second time I used it
customer_reviews.text: I used this pillow for camping once, it was great! The second time I used it and blew it up my head was on the ground after it didn't hold air for the whole night, and was completely deflated. Didn't do anything to it except blow it up twice. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on our last backpacking trip through Pictured Rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Bowler Hat Guy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, easy to inflate and deflate, easy to pack up.
customer_reviews.author: ELECTRA

product_meta.title: TREKOLOGY Ultralight Inflating Travel/Camping Pillows - Aluft 1.0 Compressible, Compact, Inflatable, Comfortable, Ergonomic Pillow for Neck & Lumbar Support While Camp, Hike, Backpacking
feature_bullets: SMALL in SIZE - BIG on COMFORT! Folds down to 5x2 inches, smaller than a soda can! Inflates to a comfortable pillow for head or lumbar support. Deflating back down in only seconds. This backpacking pillow can easily be carried in your backpack or pocket for convenient access. Weighing a mere 2.75oz (78g), lighter than a can of soda! This is the only travel pillow you will ever need period!

NEWLY DESIGNED with YOUR ULTIMATE COMFORT IN MIND! Improved Ergonomic Design with Enhanced neck support for a restful night’s sleep! The Dreamer Comfort Air Pillow is ideal for back, side and stomach sleepers alike. Inflates to a generous 16 x 12 x 4 inches, in a mere 3-5 breaths (approx.). Ergonomically designed for superior neck and back support while you travel—sleep like at home. The only thing left to decide is where to go. You can Rest easy with our 100% Satisfaction Guarantee!

NOW MORE DURABLE THAN EVER! Enhanced design with added layers for head support that is constructed from highly durable elastic TPU fabric that boasts water resistance. So, whether sleeping under the stars in the mountains, in your boat on the open seas, tenting at your favorite national park or staying at a hotel on holiday—your Dreamer comfort travel pillow is the perfect travel companion.

EASE OF USE! With the simple click of a button, Inflate pillow by mouth with approximately 3-5 breaths. Once you are done you can conveniently Deflate the pillow with the Quick Deflate feature which rapidly releases air after use in only seconds. With the unique technology in this compact and light pillow, you are able to adjust firmness to your personal sleep preference.

SLEEP WITHOUT THE WORRY with SLIP-RESISTANT DESIGN- No more slipping off your pillow in the middle of the night! The Dreamer Comfort pillow back is made up of a slip resistant material to prevent your head from moving around while you sleep. Always ensures you have a good night rest! Pairs well with air inflatable sleeping pads.
